mapper.select: /** report.reportData */ SELECT b.rNo ,b.rNo as reportKey , (SELECT apprNo from approvalBoxHeader a where a.tbKey = b.rNo and a.tbType = 'report') as apprNo , b.title , b.prdTitle , b.regUserId , dbo.getUserName(b.regUserId) as userName , dbo.getUserDeptName(b.regUserId) as deptName , b.prdFeature , b.content , b.adviserPrd , b.category1 , dbo.getCodeName('REPORTCATEGORY1', b.category1) as category1Name , b.subCategory , dbo.getCodeName(b.category1, b.subCategory) as subCategoryName , CONVERT(CHAR(10),b.regDate, 23) as regDate , b.state , b.modUserId ,CONVERT(CHAR(10), b.reportDate, 23) as reportDate ,b.isConfirm ,CASE WHEN b.isConfirm ='Y' THEN '승인' WHEN b.isConfirm = 'D' THEN '보류' WHEN b.isConfirm = 'N' THEN '미승인' END AS isConfirmText ,b.isRelease ,CASE WHEN b.isRelease ='Y' THEN '출시' ELSE '미출시' END AS isReleaseText ,b.result ,b.visitPurpose ,b.visitPlace ,b.visitUser ,b.visitTime ,b.testPurpose ,b.testDate ,b.testObject ,b.seminarDate ,b.seminarHost ,b.seminarContent ,b.isOld ,b.oldCategory ,case when b.oldCategory = 1 then '실험보고서' when b.oldCategory = 2 then '출장보고서' when b.oldCategory = 3 then '시장조사' when b.oldCategory = 4 then '보고제품' when b.oldCategory = 5 then '기술고문 제품' when b.oldCategory = 6 then '기술고문보고서' end oldCategoryName ,b.regularTitle FROM report b WHERE rNo = #{rNo}

/*report.reportBom*/ With CTE(Level, mixId, name, bom) As ( SELECT 1 as Level, mixId, name, '' as bom FROM reportMix WHERE 1 = 1 AND rNo = #{rNo}
UNION ALL SELECT 2 as Level, mixItemId as mixId, name, bom FROM reportMixItem WHERE 1 = 1 AND rNo = #{rNo} ) SELECT * FROM CTE Order by mixId, Level ASC
mapper.insert:
/*report.inserApprHeader*/
INSERT INTO approvalBoxHeader( tbKey, tbType, type, currentStep, currentUserId, totalStep, lastState, title, comment, regUserId, regDate ) VALUES( #{tbKey}, #{tbType}, #{type}, #{currentStep}, #{currentUserId}, #{totalStep}, #{lastState}, #{title}, #{comment}, #{regUserId}, GETDATE()) select SCOPE_IDENTITY()
/*report.inserApprLine*/ INSERT INTO approvalBoxInfo( apprNo, seq, targetUserId, state, regDate ) VALUES( #{apprNo}, #{seq}, #{targetUserId}, #{state}, GETDATE() )

/*report.insertRefCirc*/ INSERT INTO approvalReference( apprNo, tbKey, tbType, title, regDate, regUserId, targetUserId, type ) VALUES( #{apprNo}, #{rNo}, #{tbType}, #{title}, GETDATE(), #{regUserId}, #{targetUserId}, #{type} )
mapper.select: /*report.getAppr*/ SELECT b.apbNo ,b.apprNo ,b.seq ,b.targetUserId ,b.state ,b.regDate ,b.modDate ,b.note ,b.proxyId ,b.proxyYN FROM approvalBoxHeader a inner join approvalBoxInfo b on a.apprNo = b.apprNo WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.apprNo = #{apprNo} AND b.seq != 1

/*report.getRef*/ SELECT b.arNo ,b.apprNo ,b.tbKey ,b.tbType ,b.title ,b.regDate ,b.regUserId ,b.targetUserId ,b.type FROM approvalBoxHeader a inner join approvalReference b on a.apprNo = b.apprNo WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.apprNo = #{apprNo}
/*report.reportMix*/ SELECT seq ,rNo ,name ,mixId FROM reportMix WHERE 1 = 1 AND rNo = #{rNo}
/*report.reportMixItem*/ SELECT seq ,rNo ,mixItemId ,name ,bom FROM reportMixItem WHERE 1 = 1 AND rNo = #{rNo}
